page.title: 19SOUTHEY GRN FARM,S.HED.
page.content: We went to{Southey Green Farm} on the 20th June. They had 1200{sheep, 200{lambs,}a total of 400{bulls}and {cows,}32{shire horses}and 5{standard } {horses,}5{dogs}and lots of{cats.} They own 270 acres of{land,}which is mainly grazing. We saw some of the{bulls}in the fields.They were sharing the pasture with the{sheep}because sheep and cattle get along well together.{Dogs } on farms have to be well trained so that they do not worry the animals. Two of the{dogs}were trained to round up the sheep. The farmer does not own much{farm {machinery}but other farmers help him out by loaning him some. We saw 3 tractors and trailers and were given a ride on one.
